com.uzh.gwt.softeng.shared

Class FilmDataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uzh.gwt.softeng.shared.FilmDataSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class FilmDataSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The FilmDataSet class is responsible for managing a set of films.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • filter

        public java.util.ArrayList<FilmData> filter(java.lang.String title,
                                            java.lang.String country,
                                            java.lang.String genre,
                                            java.lang.String language,
                                            com.google.gwt.view.client.Range durationRange,
                                            com.google.gwt.view.client.Range dateRange,
                                            boolean shouldNotLimitDurationUpwards,
                                            boolean shouldNotLimitDateDownwards)
        Filter data set according to given parameters.
        Parameters:
        title - Title to search for.
        country - Country to search for.
        genre - Genre to search for.
        language - Language to search for.
        durationRange - Duration range to search for.
        dateRange - Date range to search for.
        shouldNotLimitDurationUpwards - Whether to filter only using the lower limit.
        shouldNotLimitDateDownwards - Whether to filter only using the upper limit.
        Returns:
        ArrayList filtered data set.

      • filter

        public java.util.ArrayList<FilmData> filter(java.lang.String title,
                                            java.lang.String country,
                                            java.lang.String genre,

                                            int durationMin,
                                            int durationMax,
                                            int dateMin,
                                            int dateMax)
        Filter data set according to given parameters.
        Parameters:
        title - Title to search for.
        country - Country to search for.
        genre - Genre to search for.
        language - Language to search for.
        durationMin - Duration lower limit.
        durationMax - Duration upper limit.
        dateMin - Date lower limit.
        dateMax - Date upper limit.
        Returns:
        ArrayList filtered data set.
